ValidationRule.description: Displays an error message if specified users select a billing type other than partner prime.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( NOT(ISCHANGED(Go_Live_Date__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(Closing_Survey__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(Closing_Survey_Notes__c)) ), OR( $User.Id="005500000016Vt4", $User.Id="00550000002r5na" ), NOT(ISPICKVAL(pse__Billing_Type__c, "Partner Prime")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select Partner Prime as the Billing Type.
